header.tagline: Senior Business Development Leader – LATAM & U.S. Markets

summary: Dynamic sales leader with 10+ years in SaaS and retail tech, proven record of expanding markets by 30% and exceeding sales targets by 25% annually.

bullets.text: Conduct quantitative and qualitative analysis to evaluate new business and channel opportunities, focusing on regional and cultural factors for LATAM markets.
Drive strategic customer engagement across LATAM aligning with Toshiba's business goals, resulting in robust client relations.
Prioritize and evaluate incoming partner requests ensuring alignment with Toshiba's strategic goals for optimized channel growth.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to exceed channel revenue targets and contribute to product enhancement iterations.
metrics: Contributed to a 15% increase in product adoption rates

bullets.text: Represent Toshiba at key industry events reinforcing the company as a leader in innovative commerce solutions.
Lead a team of 3 BDRs to drive efficient pipeline growth and prospecting strategies enhancing overall team effectiveness.

Developed comprehensive sales playbooks and performance tracking systems to streamline sales processes.
Created training programs to enhance SDR productivity, resulting in higher lead generation and conversion rates.

Initiated and developed sales opportunities through strategic outbound prospecting and collaboration with field sales.

Refined sales outreach sequences enhancing engagement with high-value prospects.
Provided strategic insights on pipeline management, boosting conversion rates and driving sustained growth.

Developed call scripts and lead qualification criteria in collaboration with cross-functional teams to improve first contact resolution.

metrics: Sustained 95% success rate against team targets

bullets.text: Played a key role in account development strategies, contributing to long-term growth through robust lead generation.
Led strategic initiatives to nurture client relations, deliver compelling presentations, and close driving sales opportunities.

Oversaw a portfolio of properties initiating strategic sales processes resulting in increased market coverage.
